data.title: What a surprise
data.text: My son, Ryan, set us up for golf at Schaumburg Golf Course. We had lunch after. I was expecting the usual grill type clubhouse fare. No way. This was first class dining with a beautiful bar and a great view. I had a killer strawberry, goat cheese and chicken salad. It was off the charts and I took half home in a go box. Ryan had the grilled salmon, also awesome. Please see photos.

data.title: Tasty with a great view
data.text: Just finished eating at Chandler's. The food, service and atmosphere were wonderful. I ordered the Filet Mignon sliders and they were grilled just to my liking - medium. You get 3 medallions on homemade rolls with your choice of potatoes or coleslaw. Others had salad or pastas which looked good too. Even though the restaurant got crowded, the waitress did a phenomenal job keeping all happy.

data.title: A ice spot for a really great meal
data.text: Newly remodeled-excellent food and overall good service--Elaine is awesome-nightly specials are wonderful-our favorites are burger night-rib night and breasted chicken night

data.title: Good Food, Fun Events, Good service! Come to Chandler’s!
data.text: I have been to Chandler’s many times and have had a very decent meal.  Very enjoyable!  Especially enjoyable are the lunch and dinner shows which are scheduled here, monthly, by a great family band, Denny Diamond and the Jewels.  The Chandler's food is always good at this band’s shows and the room is pleasantly decorated.  The staff is friendly and the servers are efficient.  Denny Diamond and the Jewels is a wonderful band, loaded with talent, and their shows are always great fun, with the terrific food here also a constant.  The roast beef on the menu is very good, and there is a full bar so that whether you come to eat in the regular restaurant area or go to the room which is reserved for the scheduled shows, you can enjoy a cocktail or a glass of wine with your meal.  Come for a meal or a meal and a show, and Chandler’s won’t disappoint!

data.title: Pleasantly surprise with the food here
data.text: Came here with another couple who have been here before. This was my husband's and my first visit. We had reservations and were seated in the large dining room near the windows facing the beautiful golf course and grounds. Our server was excellent without being intrusive and never once addressed any of the four in our group as "you guys". The food was some of the best I have ever had, I opted for one of the specials, grilled red snapper with a light lemon dill sauce, orzo and asparagus which were all prepared perfectly. My husband and one of the others at our table had the chopped steak, this was  very large, well seasoned cooked to perfection, covered in fresh sautéed mushrooms and onions with 2 sides of choice. The top sirloin that the fourth person in our party had was reported to have been cooked perfectly and was excellent. Each dinner came with choice of soup or salad, two sides and nice warm bread. We are looking forward to returning here and trying some of their other menu offerings.

data.title: Fantastic meal after round of golf.
data.text:
After we finished our round of golf we decide to have dinner at Chandler's as we wouldn't have much time once we got back to hotel, as we had to pack.
We started with French onion soup which was delicious, we followed this up with Penne pasta with Chicken, spinach, sundries tomatoes and Gorgonzola cheese  sauce. This was one of the best pasta dishes we have ever had, the flavour of the sun dried tomatoes was absolutely fantastic, and the cheese sauce was out of this world.
Staff were fantastic knew their job and did it very well, they were a very helpful group.
Highly recommended this restaurant.

data.title: Dinner with friends
data.text:
Wednesday is hamburger night and they were great.  A 1/2 pound burger with fries for $5?  Yep, this is the place!  I have eaten here several times and have never been disappointed and tonight was no exception,  Good service in a nice setting, plenty of parking, what find in the suburbs.  

I recommend this restaurant to anyone in the NW suburbs.

data.title: thought we might have to be members to dine here, great find!!
data.text: nicely situated on a golf course, thought we might need to be members to enter. Once at the bar, ordered the Perch, and it was great. Wife ordered the chicken Alfredo, and it was great too!

data.title: Great setting and food for a golf course.
data.text: Nice friendly restaurant and bar.  Lot's of windows to enjoy the outside area.  Many food  choices, portions and reasonably priced. Nice dining room and the bar is large with plenty of tables.  No rushing us out.  I would make reservations, just to be sure.

data.title: The Rat Pack
data.text: We went here Saturday evening for the special show with the Rat Pack we had such a great time the entertainment was excellent even thou it was a banquet type dinner it was very enjoyable ... the table we were at had to be one of the best there will be back again for this

data.title: Poor size of food
data.text: The broasted chicken was so small and dried out, I had a breast and kfc has bigger chicken pieces than here, the service was terrible, the waitress never brought cream for the coffee had to get up and go ask for the cream, hardly checked on us at all and she only had three tables. Won't go back for their chicken dinners.

data.title: Dinner at the bar
data.text: Chandlers is a favourite Saturday evening venue for me. I allways sit at the bar as do other regular guests. On this occasion I ordered the London Broil which arrived perfectly cooked medium rare as ordered, accompanied by garlic mash and mixed vegtables. There are many reasonably priced items on the menu. Atmosphere is friendly and service excellent from the Saturday Bartenders Ali and Sam.

data.title: Good eats every day!
data.text: Chandler's has specials going on for every day of the week. I know this because on Wednesdays they have a Hamburger deal for $5.00 and on Sundays Fried Chicken is on tap. There are choices for side dishes that include the best Tater Tots that I have had on a consistent basis ever. Drinks and desserts can be had that are very good too. There are separate facilities for Weddings and other happy events too.

data.title: Always a good meal - great burgers
data.text: Chandler's is a great little gem, hidden away at Schaumburg Golf Club - they have a dinner special each night, and Weds. is $5 hamburger night - great hamburger.  Also have had the chicken caeser salad, which was pretty good.  Friends have had steaks which looked pretty tasty.

data.title: Sorry to Say Never Again
data.text:
I took my wife to Chandler's to celebrate her birthday.  In the past we always had good service and food at a fair price.  On our last visit we found that things have changed since our last visit.  We usually picked Fridays because they would have a Fish Fry and have a white fish on the menu.  At one time they would also offer a glass of house wine at a very reasonable price.

On this visit we discovered that the wine deal was a thing of the past,  and the white fish was no longer on the special Friday menu.  We also discovered that the Fish Fry charged for additional servings.  At one time they brought all you wanted.  They then changed and gave you one additional plate for free.  Now it's $1.99 for additional servings.

Since my wife couldn't get her white fish she ordered the Perch Fish Fry.  Since I couldn't get additional servings of the Perch for no charge I ordered a medium Skirt Steak sandwich.  When I got my order it was very rare.  I sent it back to the kitchen and it came back in about 10 minutes. It looked cooked so I thought everything would be fine.  However my first bite tasted really burnt.  When I turned the steak over it was totally black and really not edible.  Needless to say I sent it back and the manager came to our table.  They offered me another item but by then I had lost my appetite.  My wife's meal was not as good as it has been in the past.  Usually the Perch would be crisp. What she received was kind of soft and not real exciting.

Chandler's is owned by Ala Carte Entertainment.  They are best known for their Moretti's Restaurant.  I'm not sure when Chandler's became one of their restaurants but it's just not the same anymore.  That's a real shame because the place has been remodeled and is really nice inside.  But if the food isn't great it's just not worth going.  There are plenty of great restaurants in Schaumburg.  It's too bad that Chandler's isn't one of them anymore.

data.title: Excellent venue for a wedding
data.text: Recently attended a wedding here and was blown away at everything. The location for the ceremony was outside on their patio just off the adjoining golf course. Set up of the dining room was very elegant with round tables that sat up to 10 people. The meal was served in courses by a wait staff wearing gloves:  soup, salad, main entrée and dessert. After the meal, the couple had opted to offer a spread of coffees and sweets. The table was from wall to wall and consisted of 3 types of coffees and various items to add, cheese cakes, a chocolate fountain with dozens of items to dip into it and lots and lots of bite sized cakes. It remained well stocked and clean during the entire evening.

data.title: family time
data.text: Brought the family to celebrate an occasion. Eight adults six grand kids from the ages 9 months to ten years. The food selection was great everyone enjoyed their food. The wait staff was very attentive. Good selection for a kids menu. We ordered the trio filets, the lobster. We will definitely be back.

data.title: Hooked on the Burger
data.text: My wife and I have been going there for several years. We have brought several of our friends and they think the experience is excellent. The Wednesday special is perfect mid week break.

data.title: Best ribs
data.text: Have been going for years for the Thursday special on baby back ribs, $14.99 full slab with salad, steak fries & coke slaw.  Enjoy with a glass of wine or a beer!

data.title: Bridal shower
data.text: My fiancé and I hosted our bridal shower here and it was great! The service was wonderful and the staff was accommodating. All of our guests loved it! The guys started off with us, ate and drank a bit and then went golfing while the girls chatted and opened the gifts. It worked out perfectly. The room overlooked the course and was beautiful! Thank you for making this day so special for us all!
